section.title: Description détaillée
section.para: This is a PHP class for generating PDF documents without requiring external extensions. TCPDF project (http://www.tcpdf.org) was originally derived in 2002 from the Public Domain FPDF class by Olivier Plathey (http://www.fpdf.org), but now is almost entirely rewritten.
